text:
trying to set some default headers for an api when running `Genie.loadapp()`

```    session_id = Genie.Sessions.id()
    sess = Genie.Sessions.load(session_id)
    Sessions.set!(sess, :headers, headers)```
getting the following error, `method too new to be called from this world context` any idea how to fix?
```ERROR: LoadError: MethodError: no method matching load(::String)
The applicable method may be too new: running in world age 27874, while current world is 27900.
Closest candidates are:
  load(::String) at /Users/mitchell/.julia/packages/Genie/iAR3s/src/session_adapters/FileSession.jl:103 (method too new to be called from this world context.)

FIX: I placed load behind the async() function```
